title: No price hike; no distribution until Wednesday: LITRO
body_lines: While refuting social media reports of gas price revision, LITRO Gas Lanka Limited said it has not yet decided to increase the prices of gas cylinders, a company spokesman said.
Meanwhile, he stated that domestic gas cylinders weighing 12.5 kg, 5 kg, and 2.3 kg will not be distributed until Wednesday (8).
He said the decision was taken due to insufficient stocks in hand and said a freighter bringing gas is due shortly. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
